article_title: Reports say Hamas wants Israeli air operation to end as part of any truce.
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  13,300  people,  including  more  than  5,000  children,  have  been  killed  in  the  strikes.

article_title: Reports say Hamas wants Israeli air operation to end as part of any truce.
sentence: Some  1,200  people  were  killed  in  the  7  October  Hamas  attacks  and  about  240  people  abducted.
